adjectives.description: undrunken (comparative more undrunken, superlative most undrunken)

entries.meaning: (archaic, poetic) Undrunk; that has not been drunk.
examples: Leave no drop undrunken of thy delight.
It was all very good-humoured and traditional, relatively tasteful and undrunken, with less rowdy vulgarity than you often find at such an event in Britain.
